scripts.tf:init: docker run -e AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID -e AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY -e AWS_DEFAULT_REGION -it --rm -v `pwd`:/workpace -w /workpace hashicorp/terraform:light init terraform
scripts.tf:validate: docker run -e AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID -e AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY -e AWS_DEFAULT_REGION -it --rm -v `pwd`:/workpace -w /workpace hashicorp/terraform:light validate terraform
scripts.tf:plan: docker run -e AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID -e AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY -e AWS_DEFAULT_REGION -it --rm -v `pwd`:/workpace -w /workpace hashicorp/terraform:light plan terraform
scripts.tf:apply: docker run -e AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID -e AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY -e AWS_DEFAULT_REGION -it --rm -v `pwd`:/workpace -w /workpace hashicorp/terraform:light apply -auto-approve terraform
